sense.def:
Če je neka stvar
distinct from another
, je med njima očitna razlika.

seg.quote: Our interests were quite distinct from those of the workers.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
as distinct from
natanko povemo, katero stvar imamo v mislih, tako da jo predstavimo kot nasprotje nečesa drugega.

cit.quote: v nasprotju z, v primerjavi z

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
distinct
, tisto jasno slišimo ali vidimo.

seg.quote: Jones was distinctly seen at the back door.

sense.def:
Z besedo
distinct
lahko poudarimo, da je nekaj dovolj veliko, da je opazno ali pomembno.

seg.quote: ...a Frenchwoman with a distinctly un-Latin temperament.
